title: Jsonary JSON (Hyper-)Schema wrapper
description:
A Jsonary wrapper for JSON Schemas (including hyper-schemas).

The wrapper provides methods for accessing various constraints.  It intelligently deals with both v3 and v4 schemas (for example, inspecting the "required" property to see if it's a boolean), so a standard interface can be used for all schemas, regardless of version.

allowedAdditionalProperties.description: Whether the schema allows object properties other than those returned from definedProperties().
